entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
